channel.title: Teleblock issues
channel.description: i can teleblock on monsters but cannot teleblock players, any idea y? if u need2see any code juss ask but i wasn't sure which code to post

item.title: Teleblock issues
item.dc:creator: @slick slick
item.description:
@slick wrote:

ok an update i was missing some stuff but got it now but i get this now:
The server files are being compiled.
client.java:1719: unreachable statement
int playerIndex = inStream.readSignedWordA();
^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .
any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2009, 04:05:16 pm[/size][hr]some1 has to know but the main thing im trying to do is make it to where if ur teleblocked u cant tele, and yes i know how to make things say like:
if teleblock = true
sendmsg() blah blah blah
heres my code for public void teleblock maybe that will help give u a clue of whats going on and help me solve this!

public void teleblock() { // stops from teleing anywhere teleblock = true; AntiTeleDelay = 1000; teleblock = true; sendMessage("HAHA DOCHE YOU JUST GOT TBed"); stillgfx(345, absY, absX); } [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2009, 04:17:17 pm[/size][hr]bump![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2009, 04:49:08 pm[/size][hr]still no reply or answer…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2009, 06:52:45 pm[/size][hr]solved but they can still tele

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblock issues
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You probably have a teleblock method in the AttackNPC method but not in the Attack method.
